price: 63 C’est ainsi que ceux qui ont renié Nos signes se sont détournés de la vérité.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yu'faku alladhīna kānū biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
